posts.title: Refactoring the Monolith
posts.excerpt: An 8,360-line monolith, three AI agents working in parallel, and an hour later: 12 clean ES modules. Testing Claude Code Agent Teams and Opus 4.6 on a real restructuring task.

posts.title: Arguing Software Into Existence
posts.excerpt: 90% frustration, 10% success, 100% shipped. What happens when you refuse to open an IDE and let AI write everything?
